#summary renderPage([controller,action,layout,cache])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

Renders content to the browser by including the view page for the specified controller and action.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *controller* || string || false || Currently executing controller || Controller to include the view page for ||
|| *action* || string || false || Currently executing action || Action to include the view page for ||
|| *layout* || any || false || true || The layout to wrap the content in ||
|| *cache* || any || false ||   || Minutes to cache the content for ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset renderPage(action="someOtherAction")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset renderPage(layout=false, cache=60)>
}}}
